# form-zip

The zip component

<form-zip v-model="submit.zip"/>

# Props

  • v-model String

    What the form-field is binding to

  • role String

    Role attribute (Could be used for accessibility)

  • type String

    Input type for the form input

  • validation String

    Validation to use

  • optional Boolean

    Whether or not the field is optional

  • autocomplete String

  • pattern String

  • name String

  • label String
